alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:26PM MDT until June 22 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... West central Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 426 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenland, or 24 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Elbert. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
